CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Ship_To_Name__c),'',Ship_To_Name__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Ship_To_Address_Line_1__c),'',Ship_To_Address_Line_1__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Ship_To_Address_Line_2__c),'',Ship_To_Address_Line_2__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Ship_To_Address_Line_3__c),'',Ship_To_Address_Line_3__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Ship_To_Address_Line_4__c),'',Ship_To_Address_Line_4__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Ship_To_City__c),'',Ship_To_City__c & ', ') & Ship_To_Province__c & ' ' & Ship_To_Postal_Code__c
CustomField.label: Ship To
